name: Behind Their Eyes
description:
Uncover the secrets within Santa Croce and help those that rely on you. Set in an asylum in Lucca, Italy, circa 1924. 

Play as a psychologist helping patients recover from trauma after the second world war. Step into their minds and see the world from behind their eyes.

For the best experience, please play the game in full screen by selecting the expand icon in the bottom right corner of the game player.
